name: Home, Smart Home
description:
You are a smart home system, trying to learn its users needs. With access to different gadgets around the apartment you will have one minute each day to try and make the house a comfortable place, until your user returns. Every day is another chance to get all the things juuuust right.

At the end of the day, your user will give you clues, via an 5-star rating system and one line of feedback about what could have been done better. Can you figure out what home means to them?

Credits:

  • Lowis Schwahn (Code, Music)
  • Jannik Boysen (Code, Art)
